  • Leisure, Jodi On a Super Lawyers® List

description:
With a track record of winning, our team at Carey Leisure & Neal in Clearwater, Florida, excels in personal injury. We maintain a steadfast commitment to reaching a fair outcome in your case and will pursue justice to the fullest extent, even if it means going to trial. The attorneys at our law firm combine more than 30 years of experience working exclusively on matters that include medical malpractice, car accidents, wrongful death, dog bites and slip-and-falls.

Choosing to work with our law firm means receiving benefits such as the following:

  • All of our partners are board certified in civil trial law through the National Board of Trial Advocacy
  • We offer free initial consultations
  • Our attorneys are accessible to answer your questions, even giving you their cellphone number

We will meet with you wherever it is convenient, such as your home or the hospital. Many of our attorneys have firsthand experience with losing someone in a devastating drunk driving accident or suffering the damages of a car accident. We strive to make sure you have peace of mind as we move through your case.

As a testament to our victories and customer service, the team at our law firm has earned a number of awards. For example, they have been named to the Super Lawyers list, have been selected for inclusion in The Best Lawyers in America and are members of the Million Dollar Advocates Forum. As a matter of convenience to our clients, Carey Leisure & Neal accepts credit cards.
